abstract: A.I.G. must win a court fight with an entity run by the New York Fed, which the insurer says is blocking its efforts to go after banks that harmed it financially.
snippet: A.I.G. must win a court fight with an entity run by the New York Fed, which the insurer says is blocking its efforts to go after banks that harmed it financially.
lead_paragraph: Since the summer of 2011, the insurance giant American International Group has been battling Bank of America over claims that the bank packaged and sold it defective mortgages that dealt A.I.G. billions of dollars in losses.

headline.main: A.I.G. Seeks Approval to File More Bank Suits
headline.print_headline: A.I.G. Seeks Approval To File More Bank Suits

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
